content.value: To make healthy eating more available to families living in food insecure communities, and to provide families an easy, low-cost way to cook a healthy and homemade dinner.

Eatwell works with numerous hospitals to create educational and cooking programs for individuals to access healthier recipes and cooking videos. Due to the large number of participants, it is sometimes difficult to manage and distribute the resources and media. Therefore, having a centralized web application really helps them make the process efficient and impactful.
We built an online platform that allows the admins to upload pdf, videos, description, and photos of specific recipes, and display them on the user side according to the program they are involved in.
